data.actual_result: I can't hear my friends speaking in VC, even though I can see the voice circle around their pfp light up
data.expected_result: After the phone call, VC should work fine and just allow you to speak and hear everyone else in it
data.short_description: I can't hear others in VC after making a phone call
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a VC.- While still connected to the VC, exit the Discord app and make a phone call.- End the phone call, and go back to Discord.
